name: Mark Miller
bio: Mark Miller is a six-year C# Microsoft MVP, and is one of the world's leading experts on user interface design. Mark is Chief Architect of the IDE Tools division at Developer Express, and is the visionary force behind CodeRush at devexpress.com/coderush, and creator of the Science of Great Design courses at deviq.com. Mark streams live C# & TypeScript coding & design on Twitch.tv/CodeRushed. Mark is a top-ranked speaker at conferences around the world and has been creating tools for software developers for almost four decades.
